content.question: Which of the following best describes the value assigned to b when the code segment is executed?

choices.label: A random integer between 0 and a - 1, inclusive
A random integer between a and 2 * a, inclusive
A random integer between a and 2 * a - 1, inclusive

content.answer: A random integer between a and 2 * a - 1, inclusive

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
